title: Polyphosphazene-based hyper crosslinked polymer for efficient uranium ion removal from nuclear wastewater
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00614C, Paper
Rimsha Khalid, Isham Areej, Faiza Ashraf, Saqlain Raza, Isham Areej Abid, Tayyab Ahsan, Tan Bien
This study focuses on the removal of uranium ions from nuclear wastewater by fabricating an inorganic-organic hybrid cyclic and linear polyphosphazenes based polymer. Synthesized HCP-A and HCP-B had BET surface...
